text: Zhaxi Island (; also Tashi Island) is a small island in the middle of Lake Basum Tso a green salt water lake approximately east of Lhasa in the Tibet Autonomous Region of China. There are many large stones on Zhaxi Island and each big stone is a symbol of a different Bodhisattva. == See also == *Tashi Dor Category:Islands of the Tibet Autonomous Region Category:Lake islands of China
title: Zhaxi Island
